post.author: 강동욱
post.content:
From the Start menu, choose Run.
In the Run dialog box, type: regedit.
Navigate to the HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\\\SOFTWARE\\\\Microsoft\\\\Windows NT\\\\CurrentVersion\\\\Winlogon key.
Set the AutoAdminLogon value to 1. If there is not, add the key.
Set or add the value of DefaultPassword.
post.title: [I] auto logon on Windows NT/2000
